Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.visualization.gui

Package to provide a visualization GUI.

See: Description


  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ResultVisualizer
    Handler to process and visualize a Result.
    ResultVisualizer.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    ResultWindow
    Swing window to manage a particular result visualization.
    SelectionTableWindow
    Visualizes selected Objects in a JTable, objects can be selected, changed and deleted
    SimpleSVGViewer
    A minimalistic SVG viewer with export dialog.
